title: What is the best thing that England has? - Quora

response.answer_text: Weather. Well climate if you want to be pedantic about it. Essentially everything flows from a climate that, while it can be unpredictable, is very rarely extreme. The hottest summer’s day will not be much beyond 30, the coldest winter’s day rarely below -10. Long periods of rain are rare, long period of drought are rare. So you get a very green and attractive countryside with long growing seasons which means it can support quite a large population. It’s almost a perfect climate for human beings. Basically the climate in England is not going to kill you, 99 days out of 100, but will feed you, three seasons out of four. And finally it always gives you something to talk about. Everyone in the UK is a weather expert, everyone will always be happy to talk about it.

The people in England are amazing, Firstly if someone collapses to the ground within seconds a crowd will gather round to help, most people have a medical knowledge to a point, so making someone comfortable while waiting for an ambulance is important, another thing remarkable is Policeman does not carry a firearm and people regard him as the law and do as he says, Policing by consent, I have been all over the world and seen Police armed to the teeth, if you go to a Pub where no one knows you you can usually engage in conversation but if you go to the same Pub a number of time people will say Hello, another amazing thing is you can see a Doctor or go into Hospital under the NHS Health cover for Free, England is a great place to live, many Americans live Here, so do Australians, French people, New Zealand people, South African people have moved here to live, I love every day of my life even on holiday abroad I want to get back after a few weeks.
